cpuMonitor.description: When cpuMonitor works, displayed CPU Monitor section in global settings

maxRetries.description: [value is number] Wait for this number of samples before triggering an event

cpuThreshold.description: [value is percent] If process takes more than this % of CPU, trigger an event

inactiveTime.description: [value is minutes] Amount of time tab must be inactive before discarding

domainsBlacklist.description: [value is array of string] List of domains to match: if domain is in this list, tab will be discarded

domainsWhitelist.description: [value is array of string] List of domains to match: if domain is in this list, tab will not be discarded even if it's present in blacklist

checkEverySeconds.description: [value is seconds] Take CPU samples every N seconds

enableAutoDiscard.description: [value is boolean] Whether to discard greedy tabs automatically

enableNotifications.description: [value is boolean] Whether to show notification after tab was discarded

exploreSidekickV2.description: Enable new Explore Sidekick in the help sidecar

isNtpMode.description: [boolean] Should show Explore Sidekick V2 on NTP

earlyKickTimeout.description: [value is seconds] timeout between start extension and current kick

maxUsedJSHeap.description: [value is bytes] max allowable value of js memory used

maxPrivateMemory.description: [value is bytes] max allowable value of private memory used

gmailSignature.description: Integration with Gmail for signature invites link

template.description: [value is string] Template as HTML, where %%link%% is user's invite link

intervalBetweenShowingDays.description: [value is days] interval between showing auth popup for feature

algorithm.description: [value is string] Algorithm for using in scoring

maxDelay.description: [value in ms] Maximum delay before request features after receiving push

fcm.description: Enables Firebase Cloud Messaging instead of pusher

extensionWatchdog.description: Watchdog watches if extension consume a lot of CPU for long time. It watches and restarts extension if needed

globalAuthDomains.description: Allow to visit these domains as part of any app since required for auth

domains.description: [value is list of domains] List of domains which popular for auth

nativeAdBlockAllowList.description: Allow list for browser based adblocker.

domains.description: [value is list of domains] List of domains which shouldn't be blocked by adblocker

whitelistKeepSeconds.description: [value in secs] Time to discard messengers or tabs with whitelisted domains

forceDiscardAfterSeconds.description: [value in secs] Time to force discard tab by last access time

reportIntervalSeconds.description: [value in secs] How often the system should send report about experiment. 0 should disable reporting

model_v1.description: [value is url] URL to ML-model which exported as JSON file

threshold_v1.description: [value is [0, 1] float] Threshold of ML-model scoring which using in decision maker to discarding tabs (tab's score should be less than the threshold for tab discarding)

fraction_v1.description: [value is [0, 1] float] Ratio that using to define group for experiment on startup

usageTracker2.description: Send usage-track events through new mechanism

activateTimeoutMs.description: [value in ms] Timeout before send track event

disabledDomains.description: [value is list of stings] List of domains where randomization is turned off

forcedUserAgents.description: Config for rewriting UserAgent in browser based on browser major version and platform

usageAccumulator.description: Config for sending usage-track events through accumulator

browsingUsage.description: [value is array of objects] Config for sending events split by time slots

sentrySampling.description: Reduce number of events sent to Sentry based on rules

tracesSampleRateUI.description: [value is number in 0..1] Rate of sampling for performance tracing for UI

tracesSampleRateBackground.description: [value is number in 0..1] Rate of sampling for performance tracing for background

rules.description: [value is array of rules] List of rules to apply filtering

signUpDialog.description: Should we show and block sign up by temp users or not

showAfterDays.description: [value in days] Start showing sign up dialog after N days of actual using

blockAfterDays.description: [value in days] Start blocking everything with sign up dialog after N days of actual using

version.description: [value is integer] Version of shortcuts override. Should only grow.

all.description: [value is object] Map of shortcut replaces by command names

byLocale.description: [value is object] [value is object] Map of shortcut replaces by command names grouped by locale

sharingApps.description: Enable ability for P2P sharing apps

sendEveryMinutes.description: [value is minutes] How often extension should send report to analytics

autoCloseHintDelaySeconds.description: [number in seconds] Delay before hint auto close

firstPeriodDays.description: [number in days] First showing period days number

firstPeriodShowingPeriodHours.description: [number in hours] Delay between showing in hours

otherTimeShowingPeriodHours.description: [number in hours] Delay between showing in hours after first period

shortcutsDaysPeriodForHintPass.description: [number in days] User must use shortcut in this period with shortcutsNumberForHintPass number of usage for hiding hint automatically

shortcutsNumberForHintPass.description: [number] User must use shortcut times for hiding hint automatically

hintAfterTabsClosingCount.description: [number] How much tabs/apps user must close before hint for cmd+W

userWasActivated.description: [boolean] Has been user activated in settings.

daysBeforeShowingFirstHints.description: [number] Days before showing new hints for user.

focusModeHint.description: Show hint before enabling sync of focus mode

dontBlockSync.description: [value is boolean] Should we enable the sync without confirming from the user

startAutoShowAfterDays.description: [value in days] When we start to auto show the hint after actual usage days

countDaysToAutoShow.description: [value in days] How much of actual usage days we should show the hint

shouldEnableAfterFinish.description: [value is boolean] Should we turn sync of focus mode on after finishing auto-showing hint

pmfSurvey2.description: Whether to show PMF survey banner on NTP

showEveryDays.description: [value is days] How often we should show the popup

maxTimesToShow.description: [value is number] Max times we should show the popup if user close it

syncIntervalSeconds.description: [value is number in seconds] Interval show syncing with backend

proxy.description: Ability to use our proxy server

servers.description: [value is list of domains] List of proxy servers

domains.description: [value is list of domains] List of domains which will be proxy

subscriptionPriceExperiment.description: Settings for special price for Pro plan (experiment)

runEveryDays.description: [value in days] How often we should auto-sync status in apps with Focus mode

dontClearStatus.description: [value is boolean] By default some messengers clear status after 1 day, this parameter can disable the clearing

hoverAppMenuSidebar.description: Experiment. Enable feature for hover open app menu

openningTime.description: [value in ms] hover time-out for open app service popup

closingTime.description: [value in ms] hover time-out for close app service popup

autoClosingTime.description: [value in ms] closing time when cursor not hover app popup

hoverSessionSwitcherSidebar.description: Experiment. Enable feature for hover open session switcher

delayBeforeShowing.description: [value in ms] hover time-out for open session popup

delayBeforeHiding.description: [value in ms] hover time-out for close session popup

delayBeforeAutoHiding.description: [value in ms] closing time when cursor not hover session popup

rules.description: [value is list of rules] List of rules which should't be blocked by default

schedule.description: [value is dict of options] Dict with default options for scheduling distaction blocker

isIntroPopupEnabled.description: [value in boolean] the flag of intro modal enabled

introPopupDelayHours.description: [value in number] the number of hours after onboarding that modals should be delayed

calendarsIntegrationV2.description: Enable Google and Microsoft calendars integration

disableForTrialUsers.description: [boolean] If true - intercom will visible for paid users, teams and users which get pro plan as gift

forceCollectionsEnableForTeams.description: Force enable collections for users with team plan even if collections feature is disabled

searchIconInToolbar.description: Enable search icon in toolbar instead of sidebar

defaultBrowserNotificationV3.description: Settings for showing default browser notifications reminder

firstPeriodInDays.description: [value in days] First showing period days number

intervalForFirstPeriodInHours.description: [value in hours] Delay between showing in hours in the first period

intervalForOtherPeriodInHours.description: [value in hours] Delay between showing in hours

delayFromOnboardingInHours.description: [value is number in hours] Delay after onboarding before showing

useDefaultBrowserUI.description: [value is boolean] Use browser topbar UI if true or our custom popup if false

limitDaysForPopup.description: [value in days] How much days for must visible button of shortcuts popup

sendEveryMinutes.description: [value in minutes] How often the system should send report about actual minutes used. 0 should disable reporting

maxEventsPerDay.description: [value in integer] Maximum count of events that can be sent per day. 0 should disable the limit

focusModeShortcut.description: Enable window focus mode shortcut, allowing hiding tab strip and sidebar

newBilling.description: A/B switcher for old and new billing

startTrialForOldUsers.description: [boolean] Try to start trial for not new users

daysBeforeShowingExpireSoon.description: [number in days] Number of days before showing UI about trial expiring soon

disableForTeamUsers.description: [boolean] Is new billing disabled for team users

expireSoonShowingInterval.description: [number in hours] How often we can show trial expire soon popup

yearlyOfferPopup.description: Should show special offer yearly upgrade popup on NTP. Only for monthly paid subs.

intervalInDays.description: [value in days] how often show popup

muteNotificationsPopup.description: A/B switcher for old and new notifications on sidebar

delayBeforeShowing.description: [value in ms] hover time-out for open popup

delayBeforeHiding.description: [value in ms] hover time-out for close popup

delayBeforeAutoHiding.description: [value in ms] closing time when cursor not hover popup

progressiveDiscountOffer.description: Last chance offer for annual billed plan before Trial ends and once for paid users

daysBeforeTrialEndToShow.description: [value in days] delay before trial ending

showingIntervalHours.description: [value in hours] interval for showing in showingPeriodHours

showForNotTrial.description: [value is boolean] Once show for every not trial/yearly/forever-free users

afterTrialDiscountOffer.description: Discount for motivating to buy Pro plan after trials end

showingIntervalHours.description: [value in hours] interval for showing in showingPeriodHours

daysAfterTrialEndToShow.description: [value in days] delay before trial ending

helpLinks.description: URLs for links shown in Help sidecar

whySidekickFast.description: [string] Why Sidekick browser is so fast

beforeProductHuntPopup.description: Whether to show Product Hunt notification and popup on NTP

date.description: When to show 'before Product Hunt' popup. The banner on NTP will be shown after 4 hours.

productHuntPopupLive.description: Whether to show Product Hunt Live notification and popup on NTP

productHuntLink.description: Link to which banner will follow

adblockToolbarButton.description: Should show adblocker button on toolbar

minInvitationLimitForNewTeam.description: [number] Minimum limit of people to invite to create a team

splitViewApps.description: Whether to open apps in split view that have shouldOpenInSplitView flag

sessionsForOldUsers.description: If old users can still use sessions without pro subscription

shouldShowUpgradePopup.description: [boolean] should show sessions pro upgrade popup

shouldOpenNewTabsOnTop.description: [boolean] should open NTP on the top of the tabs list

daysLimitBeforeToShow.description: after [number] days we can show modal

showVerticalTabsModal.description: Whether to show vertical tabs modal and banner

showPaidTrialModal.description: Whether to show paid trial modal

reminderCounter.description: [number] of times to show modal if user clicked remind later

cancelDiscountOffer.description: Whether to show popup with cancel discount offer
